wikipedia_page.main: John Hendy, Baron Hendy,  (born 11 April 1948) is an English barrister and politician acknowledged as one of the country's leading experts in UK labour law.

response: *John Hendy (American football), American football defensive back
*John Hendy, member of boy band East 17
On 15 July 2020, it was reported that Labour peer Lord John Hendy submitted a complaint to International Labour Organization (ILO) against the BAJ and Iran International.
* John Hendy , to be Baron Hendy, of Hayes and Harlington in the London Borough of Hillingdon
